00023    /*
00024    * Default constructor.
00025    */
00026    PairList::PairList()
00027     :
00028       atom1Ptrs_(),
00029       atom2Ptrs_(),
00030       first_(),
00031       cutoff_(0.0),
00032       atomCapacity_(0),
00033       pairCapacity_(0),
00034       nAtom1_(0),
00035       nAtom2_(0),
00036       maxNAtomLocal_(0),
00037       maxNPairLocal_(0),
00038       maxNAtom_(0),
00039       maxNPair_(0),
00040       buildCounter_(0),
00041       isAllocated_(false)
00042    {}
00043    
00044    /*
00045    * Destructor.
00046    */
00047    PairList::~PairList() 
00048    {}

00050    /*
00051    * Allocate CellList and PairList arrays, initialize to empty state.
00052    */
00053    void PairList::allocate(int atomCapacity, int pairCapacity , double cutoff) 
00054    {
00055       int i;
00056 
00057       atomCapacity_ = atomCapacity;
00058       pairCapacity_ = pairCapacity;
00059       cutoff_       = cutoff;
00060 
00061       atom1Ptrs_.allocate(atomCapacity_);
00062       atom2Ptrs_.allocate(pairCapacity_);
00063       first_.allocate(atomCapacity_ + 1);
00064    
00065       // Initialize array elements to null values
00066       for (i=0; i < atomCapacity_; ++i) {
00067          atom1Ptrs_[i] = 0;
00068          first_[i] = PairList::NullIndex;
00069       }
00070       first_[atomCapacity_] = PairList::NullIndex;
00071       for (i=0; i < pairCapacity_; ++i) {
00072          atom2Ptrs_[i] = 0;
00073       }
00074 
00075       isAllocated_ = true;
00076    
00077    }
00078 
00079    /*
00080    * Clear the PairList.
00081    */
00082    void PairList::clear()
00083    { 
00084       nAtom1_   = 0; 
00085       nAtom2_   = 0; 
00086       first_[0] = PairList::NullIndex;
00087    }
00088  
00089    /*
00090    * Build the PairList, i.e., populate it with atom pairs.
00091    */
00092    void PairList::build(CellList& cellList, bool reverseUpdateFlag)
00093    {
00094       // Precondition
00095       assert(isAllocated());
00096  
00097       Cell::NeighborArray neighbors;
00098       double dRSq, cutoffSq;
00099       const Cell*  cellPtr;
00100       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00101       Atom*  atom2Ptr;
00102       Vector dr;
00103       int    na;      // number of atoms in this cell
00104       int    nn;      // number of neighbors for a cell
00105       int    atom2Id; // atom Id for second atom
00106       int    i, j;
00107       bool   foundNeighbor;
00108   
00109       // Set maximum squared-separation for pairs in Pairlist
00110       cutoffSq = cutoff_*cutoff_;
00111    
00112       // Initialize counters for primary atoms and neighbors
00113       nAtom1_   = 0; // Number of primary atoms with neighbors
00114       nAtom2_   = 0; // Number of secondary atoms (2nd in pair), or pairs
00115       first_[0] = 0;
00116    
00117       // Find all neighbors (cell list)
00118       cellPtr = cellList.begin();
00119       while (cellPtr) {
00120          cellPtr->getNeighbors(neighbors, reverseUpdateFlag);
00121          na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00122          nn = neighbors.size();
00123          for (i = 0; i < na; ++i) {
00124             atom1Ptr = neighbors[i];
00125             foundNeighbor = false;
00126 
00127             for (j = 0; j < na; ++j) {
00128                atom2Ptr = neighbors[j];
00129 
00130                // Neighbors in the same cell as atom1
00131                if (atom2Ptr > atom1Ptr) {
00132                   atom2Id  = atom2Ptr->id();
00133                   if (!atom1Ptr->mask().isMasked(atom2Id)) {
00134                      dr.subtract(atom2Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position()); 
00135                      dRSq = dr.square();
00136                      if (dRSq < cutoffSq) {
00137       
00138                         if (nAtom2_ >= pairCapacity_) {
00139                            UTIL_THROW("Overflow: # pairs > pairCapacity_");
00140                         }
00141       
00142                         // If first neighbor of atom1, add atom1 to atom1Ptrs_
00143                         if (!foundNeighbor) {
00144    
00145                            if (nAtom1_ >= atomCapacity_) {
00146                               UTIL_THROW("Overflow: # pairs > pairCapacity_");
00147                            }
00148                            assert(nAtom1_ >= 0);
00149    
00150                            atom1Ptrs_[nAtom1_] = atom1Ptr;
00151                            foundNeighbor = true;
00152                         }
00153       
00154                         // Append 2nd atom to atom2Ptrs_[]
00155                         atom2Ptrs_[nAtom2_] = atom2Ptr;
00156                         ++nAtom2_;
00157       
00158                      }
00159                   }
00160                }
00161             }
00162 
00163             // Atoms in neighboring cells
00164             for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00165                atom2Ptr = neighbors[j];
00166                atom2Id  = atom2Ptr->id();
00167                if (!atom1Ptr->mask().isMasked(atom2Id)) {
00168                   dr.subtract(atom2Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position()); 
00169                   dRSq = dr.square();
00170                   if (dRSq < cutoffSq) {
00171    
00172                      // Check for overflow of atom2Ptrs_
00173                      if (nAtom2_ >= pairCapacity_) {
00174                         UTIL_THROW("Overflow: # pairs > pairCapacity_");
00175                      }
00176    
00177                      // If first_ neighbor, record iAtomId in atom1Ptrs_
00178                      if (!foundNeighbor) {
00179    
00180                         if (nAtom1_ >= atomCapacity_) {
00181                            UTIL_THROW("Overflow: # pairs > pairCapacity_");
00182                         }
00183                         assert(nAtom1_ >= 0);
00184    
00185                         atom1Ptrs_[nAtom1_] = atom1Ptr;
00186                         foundNeighbor = true;
00187                      }
00188    
00189                      // Append Id of 2nd atom in pair to atom2Ptrs_[]
00190                      atom2Ptrs_[nAtom2_] = atom2Ptr;
00191                      ++nAtom2_;
00192                  }
00193               }
00194    
00195             }
00196   
00197             // When finished with atom1, set next element of first_ array.
00198             if (foundNeighbor) {
00199                ++nAtom1_;
00200                first_[nAtom1_] = nAtom2_;
00201             }
00202          }
00203          cellPtr = cellPtr->nextCellPtr();
00204       }
00205 
00206       // Increment buildCounter_= number of times the list has been built.
00207       ++buildCounter_;
00208  
00209       // Increment maxima
00210       if (nAtom1_ > maxNAtomLocal_) maxNAtomLocal_ = nAtom1_;
00211       if (nAtom2_ > maxNPairLocal_) maxNPairLocal_ = nAtom2_;
00212      
00213    }
00214 
00215    /*
00216    * Initialize a pair iterator.
00217    */
00218    void PairList::begin(PairIterator& iterator) const
00219    {
00220       iterator.atom1Ptrs_ = &atom1Ptrs_[0];
00221       iterator.atom2Ptrs_ = &atom2Ptrs_[0];
00222       iterator.first_     = &first_[0];
00223       iterator.nAtom1_    = nAtom1_;
00224       iterator.nAtom2_    = nAtom2_;
00225       iterator.atom1Id_   = 0;
00226       iterator.atom2Id_   = 0;
00227    }
00228 
00229    /*
00230    * Compute memory usage statistics (call on all processors).
00231    */
00232    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00233    void PairList::computeStatistics(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00234    #else
00235    void PairList::computeStatistics()
00236    #endif
00237    { 
00238       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00239       int maxNAtomGlobal;
00240       int maxNPairGlobal;
00241       communicator.Allreduce(&maxNAtomLocal_, &maxNAtomGlobal, 1, 
00242                              MPI::INT, MPI::MAX);
00243       communicator.Allreduce(&maxNPairLocal_, &maxNPairGlobal, 1, 
00244                              MPI::INT, MPI::MAX);
00245       maxNAtom_.set(maxNAtomGlobal);
00246       maxNPair_.set(maxNPairGlobal);
00247       maxNAtomLocal_ = maxNAtomGlobal;
00248       maxNPairLocal_ = maxNPairGlobal;
00249       #else
00250       maxNAtom_.set(maxNAtomLocal_);
00251       maxNPair_.set(maxNPairLocal_);
00252       #endif
00253    }
00254 
00255    /*
00256    * Clear all statistics.
00257    */
00258    void PairList::clearStatistics() 
00259    {
00260       maxNAtomLocal_ = 0;
00261       maxNPairLocal_ = 0;
00262       maxNAtom_.unset();
00263       maxNPair_.unset();
00264       buildCounter_ = 0;
00265    }
00266 
00267    /*
00268    * Output statistics.
00269    */
00270    void PairList::outputStatistics(std::ostream& out)
00271    {
00272 
00273       out << std::endl;
00274       out << "PairList" << std::endl;
00275       out << "NPair: max, capacity     " 
00276                   << Int(maxNPair_.value(), 10)
00277                   << Int(pairCapacity_, 10)
00278                   << std::endl;
00279       out << "NAtom: max, capacity     " 
00280                   << Int(maxNAtom_.value(), 10)
00281                   << Int(atomCapacity_, 10)
00282                   << std::endl;
00283    }

00286    /*
00287    * Return true if valid, or throw Exception.
00288    */
00289    bool PairList::isValid() const
00290    {
00291       if (isAllocated()) {
00292 
00293          // Check for null pointers to allocated arrays
00294 
00295          if (atomCapacity_ <= 0) UTIL_THROW("atomCapacity_ <= 0"); 
00296          if (pairCapacity_ <= 0) UTIL_THROW("pairCapacity_ <= 0"); 
00297 
00298          //if (atom1Ptrs_ == 0)    UTIL_THROW("Null atom1Ptrs_"); 
00299          //if (atom2Ptrs_ == 0)    UTIL_THROW("Null atom2Ptrs_"); 
00300          //if (first_ == 0)        UTIL_THROW("Null first_"); 
00301 
00302          if (nAtom1_ < 0) {
00303             UTIL_THROW("nAtom1_ < 0");
00304          }
00305       }
00306 
00307       return true;
00308    }
